text: hi everyone its Ellen here today I'm
going to make a really simple salad
with bamboo shoots is called Lauren man
it's a very simple dish that you can
serve in a daily meal with rice and it
can also be a great appetizer
you know bamboo shoot is the sprouts of
the bamboo tree it doesn't really have
much nutrition but then it has a great
texture and add good fiber to your diet
so let's begin you're gonna need about
300 gram of bamboo shoot' split the
bottom part and then thinly slice
crosswise like this for the top part
just thinly slice lengthwise like this
next boy the bamboo shoot with enough
water to cover together with half a
teaspoon of salt you can do this two or
three times to remove all the toxins in
the bamboo shoot and about 1/4 TSP of
turmeric powder if you want your bamboo
shoot' to have a nicer yellow color then
drain and squeeze out the excess water
shred half a carrot into thin strips
also roughly chopped up a half a cup of
Vietnamese mints or rowrr am now in a
hot pan over medium heat toasts about
quarter cup of white sesame seeds until
they turn golden then turn off the heat
and let cool and then roughly crush them
in a mortar and pestle to bring out the
amazing aroma use on 800 gram of pot
belly thinly slice or vegetarian
versions you can also use mushrooms or
fry tofu pot season with mint shallots
chicken stock and pepper about half a
teaspoon each and one tablespoon of fish
sauce
now heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil
in a pan and then fry a teaspoon of
minced garlic until fragrant then
passing the meat and stir-fry until is
no longer pink I also add about 100 gram
of prawns which I have steamed peeled
deveined and cut in half lengthwise by
stir frying the seasonings can absorbs
better into the meat and the prawns now
in a large mixing bowl mix together the
bamboo shoot and carrot and the store
fry pot and shrimps you can adjust the
taste with more salt pepper and chicken
stock to your liking finally add the
rhotacism aces and also the job to
Vietnamese mint transfer it to the
serving plate and sprinkle more sesame
seeds on top this is a great side dish
to serve it right you can also just eat
it along with a rice seasoned meat
cracker while the color contrast is
really vibrant now crack a piss-up rice
cracker and put the bamboo shoot' salad
on top don't forget some chilli gems -
mmm the bamboo shoot and carrots are
crunchy the meat and shrimps are
slightly chewy and soft and combined
with that nutty flavor of the season
basis it tastes so good and so fragrant
you have to give this recipe a try and
don't forget to let me know how it turns
out thank you for watching bye
